data.eml:eml: A relict lineage and new species of green palm-pitviper (Squamata, Viperidae, Bothriechis) from the Chortis Highlands of Mesoamerica

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Townsend, Josiah H., Medina-Flores, Melissa, Wilson, Larry David, Jadin, Robert C., Austin, James D. (2013): A relict lineage and new species of green palm-pitviper (Squamata, Viperidae, Bothriechis) from the Chortis Highlands of Mesoamerica. ZooKeys 298: 77-106, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.298.4834, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.298.4834
